title: In Harm's Way
description: As a member of the Guardians, Troy will spend the next year overseeing the team's base of operations on a remote private islandâ€”alone. So when the sister of a fellow agent appears on the island looking for a getaway, Troy is unnerved by her presence. Hiding his top-secret work from the beautiful visitor is a recipe for disaster.
author: Traci Hunter Abramson
